meanings.definition: A person or thing that awakens someone from sleep.
meanings.sent1: The alarm clock is an awakener that helps me wake up in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The loud noise of the fire alarm acted as an awakener for the entire building.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy became an unexpected awakener when it licked my face to wake me up.
meanings.sent4: The sun rising over the horizon served as a natural awakener, gently nudging everyone from their slumber.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly brewed coffee is a delightful awakener that entices me out of bed every day.

meanings.definition: Something that causes someone to become aware or alert.
meanings.sent1: The shocking news was a sudden awakener, making everyone pay attention.
meanings.sent2: The loud thunder was a powerful awakener, jolting everyone out of their daze.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected pop quiz was a sneaky awakener, catching the students off guard.
meanings.sent4: The wise words of the teacher acted as an awakener, opening the students' minds to new possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The bright flashing lights served as a visual awakener, signaling danger ahead.
